Name: HEX PLAT
About the game: About This Game The Game Is A Simple 2.5d Platform Action Game. The player can move and jump. That and solve puzzles using little gimmicks in the stages. Some of the stages are a bit meaner than others, but you'll get through them. How to Play The only controls in the game are A, D and Space on the keyboard; the UI controls use the mouse, but the basic parts of the game can be played with one hand. The objective of each stage is simple: manipulate the spheres to reach the red glowing tiles, that's it.
